title: Interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Having a child in your arms, especially for a married or pregnant woman, gives her a wonderful feeling according to the maternal instinct, so what does seeing it in a dream mean for both a married, pregnant and single woman? This is our topic today, which talks about the interpretation of giving birth to a child in your arms by Ibn Sirin, the most famous interpreter in the field of dreams. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms? It is a good vision by all standards, as long as the child's appearance is beautiful and not dirty, and as long as his face is innocent, then seeing him in the hand of an unmarried woman can express that her date with happiness is approaching anyway. As for the married woman who wants to give birth and finds an obstacle to achieving her dream, achieving her desire is much closer than she thinks. If there is something that bothers the dreamer in his life, almost drowning him in a crisis of severe depression, believing that there is no solution to these problems, then this dream is like good news of the resurrection of hope, and that every problem must have a solution and every night must come after it. If someone gives you a small child and you do not know where he got it from, then this is a lot of money coming to you from where you do not know. If you see that you are petting a child and you are happy with what you are doing, the meaning of the dream may be your recklessness in life in general, but it may have another meaning related to trying to get rid of the negative thoughts that have controlled you all the time, in the past tense and indeed your thinking is heading Towards what is positive. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms according to Ibn Sirin? Our respected scholar, Muhammad bin Sirin, is the most famous dream interpretation scholar whose words we trust. He said that the interpretation of this dream is related to the details contained in it. We find him narrating his interpretations of the vision as follows: If the fortune teller is a man of money and trade and sees that there is a child in his arms and he is trying to take care of him, then it is a new project that is offered to him and he is confused between accepting it or not. No, but it actually brings him more money and reputation in the world of commerce. As for the unmarried girl, it is better for her to achieve her dreams soon, and she will excel in her studies if she is still a student. When this miserable young man who has suffered a lot in his life sees this dream, this is evidence that his circumstances are different, and that they have changed significantly for the better. Ibn Sirin said that the good behind this dream is not determined by money or position only, but it is possible that the dreamer feels lonely or the absence of someone standing by him in his life, but in the near future there is a high probability of a friend or life partner to give him love and loyalty and support him and support him in his future. What is the interpretation of a dream about a child in your arms for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about a child in your hands A single girl whose life goes through a series of events, sometimes she finds hope in forming an emotional relationship with a person she believes suits her in all directions, and at other times she feels a loss of confidence in everyone around her and believes that distance and isolation are the most appropriate solutions to her problem, so her vision of the infant expresses the following: If she finds the infant smiling at her while she is in her arms, she should calm down and not care about things More than you deserve, no

title: Dream interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream in different situations

preview.html: We will deal with the interpretation of seeing an earthquake in a dream in different cases. An earthquake or shaking of the globe is a natural disaster that spreads panic and fear to people, so seeing it in a dream causes panic in the dreamer. This does not mean that seeing him in a dream always means bad. Seeing an earthquake in some dreams can be beneficial to the pioneer, and we will discuss this on the encyclopedia website. Earthquake in a dream The house is shaking in a dream. If the dreamer sees in his dream an earthquake or an earthquake striking a specific city and destroying homes, this means that the master of that city is torturing its people and setting unfair laws before... The end of his reign or it will be. He is removed from power and is followed by an unjust ruler who tortures the people of this country. However, if he sees that an earthquake hits the houses and they tremble without falling, then there is a great authority who presides over the state and turns its situation around and changes its laws for the better. Some interpreters believe that seeing an earthquake shaking the house in a dream means that the person dear to the dreamer will die. Also, seeing the house shaking without any rest Houses mean that a dangerous disease will attack the residents of that house. If the dreamer sees that the floor of his house is shaking violently, this means that he will hear bad news that will cause him great sadness. An earthquake in a single woman’s dream. Anyone who sees an earthquake in her dream means that she is afraid of something that will happen to her in the future or that she She will enter into a failed romantic relationship that will cause her psychological damage for a long time. Also, if she sees a violent earthquake that hurts her, this means that it is a warning against making a wrong decision that may harm her or make her life unstable in the future. And if she dreams that she escapes the damage caused by the earthquake, this indicates However, she will get out of a problem that caused her sadness and anxiety. Seeing an earthquake in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees an earthquake in her dream indicates the presence of severe family disputes that may lead to separation or social problems surrounding her. If a married woman sees in her dream that the earth is trembling and water comes out of it. This means that sustenance will come to her after long suffering and strong problems that she will go through. Seeing an earthquake in a dream has a good meaning if it does not result in devastation and devastation. If a married woman sees that the earth is trembling, splitting, and gold and treasures coming out, this indicates an improvement in her financial condition. Surviving an earthquake in a dream. If a person sees in his dream that an earthquake has struck the earth and he has escaped from it, this means that he will escape from the distress that befell him or the distress that befell him, or the debt that he will pay soon. Surviving an earthquake in a dream indicates the loss of worries, problems, and ability. The viewer is able to get rid of the crises he is experiencing and means that God will compensate the dreamer for all the losses he has incurred in his life and life will be transformed. For a better situation, God willing. Interpretations of a dream about a mild earthquake: Since seeing a strong earthquake in a dream indicates distress, adversity, and the occurrence of disasters, seeing a mild earthquake in a dream means that the dreamer will face difficulties in his life, overcome them, and achieve the success he wants. Also, seeing a slight earthquake is evidence of... That illness or stress will strike

title: Interpretation of a dream about money

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about money in a dream? During his journey in life, a person searches for money to be able to achieve what he wants. Disagreements arise between people because of money, or families separate or come together because of inheritance money. If you have money, people will gather around you, and if you lose, they will disperse around you! This is what money does in life, do you do the same in dreams? What are the signs of seeing money in a dream and is it good news or a warning? This is what we will learn by reading this article on the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a dream about money in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about money in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that money often indicates distress and anguish that the dreamer suffers from, and seeing the money disposed of or distributing it to others is good news for the dreamer that He will be freed from the worries that control him. Whoever sees that he is walking somewhere and finds money falling on the ground, then picks it up, this indicates that he will face problems and troubles, and if he sees that he left it and went on, God will protect him from these. Disasters. Seeing coins in a dream means that their owner will face bankruptcy. Seeing paper money is considered a good thing for solving problems. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single woman: An individual seeing a lot of money means that this girl has high hopes and many ambitions in life that she wants to achieve. If she sees If a single girl had a lot of money but lost it, this is a message to her that she has lost many golden opportunities that would change the course of her life or that she is wasting a lot. Time for trivial and useless matters. This dream is a sign for this girl to seize the opportunities available to her and use her time to her advantage so that her life is not in vain. One interpretation when she sees paper money in a dream for an unmarried girl said that she will marry a rich, generous man or that someone will give her something valuable in gold or diamonds and it can This gift will be her engagement gift. But if the girl sees coins, this means that she will face some problems with her family and she must obey her parents and avoid problems with them. Interpretation of a dream about saving money in a dream: An auspicious dream is to see that someone has given her paper money. Because it means that he will get a lot of goodness from this person, for example, he will get an important job, or he will spend a benefit on him that he wants, but this does not necessarily mean that this person will give him money. Likewise, from good dreams, a person sees that he has a lot of goodness. Money and distributes it to others, and this means that this person is a kind and generous person who meets people’s needs and helps them. And if he sees that he has a lot of money in his house, and that this money has been given to another person and he has nothing left, then this is also good news to relieve the worry and anxiety that he suffers from. From it.Interpretation of a dream about finding money in a dreamFinding money in a dream has many interpretations, sometimes good and sometimes bad. Let's get to know them:If someone finds money on the street, it means that he will have some problems at work. But this is not

title: Interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Gray hair is one of the signs of this age, even if it does not affect youth sometimes. Some young people turn gray as a result of psychological pressure, and it cannot be prevented due to the lack of melanin in the body. Sometimes it turns gray according to the color of the skin, if it is White or brown, and the appearance of gray hair cannot be avoided if it begins to appear, but to avoid premature graying, you must get used to stability and psychological calm, avoid nervous tension, and maintain a balanced diet with vitamins, calcium, and other healthy foods. In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that gray hair in a dream sometimes indicates poverty. When the sleeper sees a lot of white hair in his dream, this is a sign of many fears and problems. If the sleeper sees his hair turning gray in his dream, this is a sign that many troubles and misfortunes will occur in the coming period, and this vision may indicate the death of a relative, and God alone He teaches appointments. If the sleeper is a scholar and teaches people about religion and worldly affairs, then gray hair in the dream indicates a high position in society and reverence for people and that he is a good person, and this vision can appear sometimes. I hope that the one who saw the dream will live and grow up to see gray hair. This dream may sometimes indicate the return of absentees from their exile to their homeland. And if the sleeper sees that he is plucking his white hair, this is a sign of a great calamity that will befall him in the coming days, because plucking gray hair violates the Sunnah of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace. Peace be upon him. Erin. May God’s prayers and peace be upon him. The graying of the beard in a dream indicates the sadness that will befall the sleeper and that his condition will get worse. Interpretation of the appearance of gray hair in girls: Seeing gray hair in a dream for a girl may sometimes be an unpleasant vision. If a girl sees in a dream that all of her hair has turned grey, this is a sign of sadness and illness entering her life. But if she sees gray hair in a small part of her hair, this is a sign of her long life, the great wealth she will possess in her life and that she will rise to a great position. In society. But if a girl sees that her hair color has changed to grey, this is good news that she will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream for a married woman. Seeing gray hair in a married woman’s dream is a praiseworthy vision and its meaning is good. It indicates her husband’s progress and success at work, and perhaps even his promotion. But if a married woman dreams in her dream that only her front hair is new, then this is evidence of her husband’s betrayal, his bad morals, and that he will marry her. Interpretation of seeing gray hair in a dream for a pregnant woman: seeing gray hair in a dream A pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to bad offspring and will suffer from the disobedience of her children. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has a white beard, this is a sign of problems and fears of solving them. If she dreams

title: Interpretation of marriage in a dream The meaning of marriage in a dream

preview.html: The vision of marriage for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she buys a white dress, and the bride and groom’s family join the wedding ceremony, dancing, singing, and worshiping. Or the honeymoon of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Seeing a wedding in a dream. If you dream of a wedding, this means that you are on the verge of a new beginning in your life, and the wedding reflects your problems with commitment and independence. In this regard, your dreams of marriage may be evidence of your feelings of bitterness and sadness. If the wedding in a dream turns into a disaster, this means that you need to find a solution to some unresolved and negative issues in your life. If you are about to get married and dream of endless preparations for the wedding, then this It indicates the enormous pressures present at this time, which can range from conflict over wedding details to fear of commitment and loss of independence. But if you dream of being invited to a wedding, focus on the type of emotions you felt during it. If you are feeling sad, it means that you are not happy with the way your life is going and vice versa. If you dream that you are marrying your current husband, this reflects the marital bliss that you enjoy and the strength of your commitment to each other. It can also indicate the beginning of a new stage in your life, such as moving to a new home or having a new child. On the other hand, preparing for the wedding of someone you do not know can symbolize the union of your feminine side with your masculine side and can be a transitional stage in which you are looking for... A way to balance your passion and hostility. Seeing a wedding in a dream Although a wedding ceremony is a matter of joy and joy, seeing it in a dream has a different meaning, as seeing a wedding accompanied by singing and dancing portends the death of a person in the place where the celebration is being held. Whoever sees himself preparing for his wedding in a dream and inspecting his bride, this indicates the beginning of a new stage in his life, and if he does not see the bride in the dream, this portends his death and may indicate poverty and the bankruptcy of women and their disobedience and disobedience, and God knows best. Seeing the bride in a dream Seeing the bride in a dream symbolizes To a life full of opportunity and kindness, if that bride is beautiful. As for a girl or woman who sees herself as a bride in a dream, this means that she is going through a crisis or a problem that will be overcome soon, God willing. Seeing a groom in a dream As for seeing a groom in a dream, it indicates the friendship of an evil and cunning deceitful man, or the loss of something precious and precious, or the commission of some crime. Seeing the bride’s family in a dream. In general, seeing the bride’s family or the groom’s family in a dream indicates that there are people in the dreamer’s life who provide him with material or moral assistance. Seeing a wedding dress in a dream. A wedding dress in a dream. In a dream for a married woman, it portends problems between the spouses, and the wedding dress in a dream. The dream of an unmarried girl portends fears and problems that will soon disappear. As for seeing the groom’s suit in a dream, it portends the death of a person close and known to the monarch. The white suit heralds the recovery of the patient and the suit

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing celebrities in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing celebrities in a dream, the effects of meeting a celebrity in a dream on a single married and pregnant woman, the meaning of peace in celebrities, seeing a celebrity wedding, the meaning of accompanying a celebrity, and famous people in dreams that many people dream of, but they do not know what the interpretation is . Therefore, we will learn about it today by explaining in detail the vision of celebrities in a dream in this article. Interpretation of a dream about celebrities in a dream: The interpretation of celebrities seen in a dream is considered unpleasant visions, because they are evidence of lies and deception. Dreaming about meeting a celebrity in a dream indicates a number of problems And hardships and sorrows, as well as their popularity. The interpretation of seeing celebrities at home in a dream is evidence of many family problems and disagreements between family members. Seeing taken with a celebrity in a dream. This suggests that the monarch was deceived, scheming, and extremely hypocritical. Interpretation of a person’s dream that he became famous in a dream is evidence that he is deceiving people close to him and must be stopped. Seeing someone who likes celebrities in a dream is a sign of failure in work and study and great disappointment. Interpretation of a dream about celebrities in A dream for a single woman: Interpretation of dreams about celebrities and artists in a dream for a single woman is evidence of recklessness, haste, and lack of thinking before making decisive decisions in her life. A dream of peace for celebrities in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will go through many problems and sorrows due to wrong behavior. Seeing a single girl in Dreaming about a celebrity means that she will achieve what she wants and aspires to in her life. Seeing a wedding with a celebrity in an unmarried woman’s dream means that her engagement and marriage is approaching with the person who suits her. Dreaming of seeing a celebrity accompanying a dream for a single woman may indicate that she is deceiving many people. Those around her. Interpretation of a dream about celebrities in a dream for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing celebrities at home for a married woman as evidence of goodness for her and her family and a feeling of happiness and stability with her husband. Seeing yourself photographed with celebrities in a dream for a married woman indicates that she will fulfill many desires and ambitions and promote the husband in the future. His work. The interpretation of the dream that celebrities visit a married woman indicates that her husband has been promoted at work and will obtain the highest ranks among the people. Seeing playing with celebrities in a married woman’s dream means that she is deceitful and is using her intelligence in obscene acts and you must stop her. The dream of seeing a famous woman hugging a woman indicates Married to happiness and improvement in her relationship with her husband after a period of discord. Interpretation of a dream about celebrities in a pregnant woman’s dream: Interpretation of a dream about a celebrity in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the ease and comfort of childbirth, and you are sure of her safety and the safety of the newborn. A dream about a gift from a celebrity in a dream indicates For a pregnant woman, it indicates that she will give birth to a child. As for a gift of a ring from a celebrity in a dream to a pregnant woman, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a dream about celebrities in a man’s dream: Seeing a famous man in a dream is evidence that he will achieve what he wants.

title: Interpretation of sweat in a dream. The meaning of body sweating in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the tribe for the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, and the divorced woman, whether on the body, face, chest, or head, and the emergence of the tribe according to Ibn Sirin. Meanings of sweat in a dream. Given what some interpreters have mentioned in the interpretation of seeing sweat or perspiration coming out of the body in a dream and a dream, many The meanings and connotations that we will explain in this article have been mentioned in the interpretation of the various cases of this vision that Imam Ibn Shirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned in his special interpretation books. It is better to see sweat coming out in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing sweat in a dream can indicate There are many good meanings for the dreamer, such as someone who sees in his dream that sweat is flowing from his body, or that sweat is on his forehead, or on his hands, or on one of his other organs. This indicates the satisfaction of needs, the fulfillment of what is desired, and the satisfaction of the desires that the viewer desires to achieve. As well as the ease and success found in awakening. It has also been said that seeing someone expelling his sweat from his body after ejaculation is a sign of relief from the worries, sorrows and misfortunes that the dreamer suffers from in reality. Also, the release of sweat and its descent from the body is a sign of freedom from pain, worries, sorrows, and everything that worries or saddens the viewer. If a person sees in his dream that he is sweating from another person or taking another person’s sweat with his hands, then his vision indicates that the dreamer receives sums of money from this person in real life. And if sweat in all its forms smells good and is dear to the soul, then seeing it carries meanings of goodness, nourishment, happiness, and comfort, God willing. Unpleasant things are not expected to occur in the dreamer's daily life. From the dreamer and his excessive hypocrisy among men, and showing his good deeds by praising himself in front of others. It is said that in some cases leaving the tribe in a dream may indicate the death of one of the people from the dreamer’s family or one of his friends, or that there is a division, separation, and rupture occurring between the dreamer and. A of people. In fact, the fight was said to be about money. The sweat comes out of his body after his departure, as this dream shows the loss of money and its loss in reality, and the person whose dream sees that the person has taken his sweat, then the dream indicates the transfer of money by the dreamer. For this person in reality. In a dream, it is well-being for the patient if he wishes it, otherwise it is the sweat of death. Sweat is evidence of the harm of the world, and whoever sees that he refuses to fight will get what he needs. Stinking armpit sweat indicates an epidemic. Sweat is money. If he sees sweat flowing from his body, money will flow from him. Sweat can be a fatigue that affects whoever sees it. Other interpretations of seeing sweat in a dream: Seeing sweat in a dream is one of the dreams that carry many meanings and associations, and some of these interpretations are good and others have a bad connotation. Seeing sweat in a dream by Ibn Sirin can be good and indicates that all problems and fears The dreamer will be solved and gone

title: I dreamed that my father died and I was crying a lot about being single

preview.html: It also shows some happy things about its owner and many changes may occur in his upcoming life or alert him to something. Interpretation of seeing my dead father and crying intensely over him in a dream about a single girl The death of the father in the dream of an unmarried girl is a happy dream, contrary to what many expect. This dream indicates that the life of an unmarried woman will be promising. The single woman who sees her father die in her sleep and she is actually traveling. This is an indication that his health will deteriorate in the coming days. The virgin girl who sees her father dead and cries from the heart, this is a sign of goodness and abundance in her next life. The father's dream of an unmarried girl crying over him and screaming at him is evidence that she will leave the house and move to the marital home. The girl crying over her dead father in a dream with a burning heart is evidence that she will enjoy a happy life and a happy life in her future. The girl who saw her father talking to her seconds before his death. What proves that she will receive a lot of answers to her previous prayers and get a good husband. See also: Interpretation of hugging the dead father in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing my dead father and crying over him in a dream for a married woman Married The one who sees that her father has died, this is evidence of her good planting, and this is evidence of sustenance and goodness. The married woman who sees that her father has died from God, this is a sign from God that all her problems will be solved. And the woman who sees in her dream that her father is talking to her, and crying, this is a sign that she desires his kindness and tenderness. Interpretation of seeing my father dead and crying over him loudly in a dream about a man and its meaning The man who dreams of the death of his father from God, this is a sign of fear for him. Whoever dreams of the death of his father is evidence of a secret falling into his hands that was hidden from him, but he knows it now. There died the man who saw his father on a trip. This is a sign of suffering. Whoever sees that his father died in a dream and died in reality. This indicates that you will have more and more money. The man who saw that he was warning his father in a dream and that he would die. This is a sign that they had a quarrel in reality, indicating that the dreamer will deeply regret his actions with his father. Seeing the father in a man's dream while he is alive is a sign that his father lives a long life. The appearance of the father in a man's dream crying, and he is already dead, is evidence of his need for the prayers of his children for him. The man who sees that he is talking to him and disagrees with his opinion, this indicates the advice of the father. And the advice of the dead benefits him and helps him solve problems. Read also: Seeing a dead father in a dream by Ibn Sirin The meaning of seeing my father dying and crying loudly over him in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father for a pregnant woman. It indicates that there are many factors, including the feeling of being with the father and returning to life. I dreamed of the dead father that he died in a dream and felt sad and sad, but she did not cry loudly in the dream. This vision is evidence of the solutions of grace. The pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is sad about her father's separation without tears And screaming. Evidence that God will give her a righteous son. A pregnant woman who dreams that she is standing at a funeral and

title: More than 50 interpretations of a dream about a toilet for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream for a single woman? The toilet is considered one of the important places in every home, where people fulfill their needs, but in the end it is a stronghold of evil and wickedness, and one must seek refuge before entering it, so seeing it in a dream raises the questions of the rest of the dream. Seeing the toilet In a dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer will be relieved of his problems and worries and the patient will be cured of his illness as long as the toilet appears clean to the dreamer in his dream. If the purpose of his entry is to take a shower, this means that the dreamer wants to return to God and purify his heart from the impurity that has afflicted him as a result of committing sins and disobedience. Forgiveness. Seeing the toilet without urinating indicates some problems that the dreamer faces, but he will overcome them with the strength of his faith and piety. But if the fortuneteller enters and does nothing and goes out again, this indicates that radical changes will occur in his life. And if the sinner who is far from his Lord sees himself entering the toilet. Without washing or resting, it is a sign that he is indulging in worldly pleasures and committing many sins without conscience. If a person begins to wash while he is sleeping, he has a conscience that rebukes him and warns him if he does something that violates the law, so he resorts to purification from the sins that he committed in the previous period. He takes a bath and is still immersed in his sins. The toilet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the details, and here we will learn about all the interpretations he mentioned: The interpretation of dreams for a married man indicates that he committed a crime against his wife and his acquaintance with another woman and committed indecency with her, whether verbally or verbally. The act. It also expresses the anxiety that the dreamer suffers from in his life and he may go through severe financial difficulties that he cannot overcome. But if the dreamer was able to relieve himself in the toilet in his dream, then he was able to get rid of his sorrows, and if he is in debt, he will pay off his debt, and if Sick, he will recover very quickly. Thus, whoever sees that the toilet has been completely destroyed will fight many battles to achieve his goals, and many obstacles that he will try to overcome but cannot. Interpretation of a dream about a toilet in a dream for a single woman. If a girl sees in her dream a closed toilet, this is a sign that she is suffering from accumulations that negatively affect her Her psychology, or that she knows a specific person without showing this relationship to those around her. For her, if the toilet is unclean, it represents many problems in her life and she may be exposed to ridicule from those around her because of the delay in her marriage. If the girl is of school age and sees dirt in the toilet in In her dream, she suffers from severe academic delay and may fail to pass the upcoming exams. As for her entering them without eliminating herself, it is a sign of an abnormal personality, as she shows people a face different from the real face, where people know her purity and chastity, but unfortunately she commits sins and evils that Keep her away. From God. If a girl feels comfortable in a dream, she can overcome her worries and problems, or she can get rid of the threats of some people who want to
